Text:
All cars work in the Summer Modes. A lot of cars don't have a "winter skin" (*_z.sds). If you want to drive in them in the winter, open the pc\sds\cars directory and copy the files without _z and rename them to *_z.sds
Remember: copy and rename, don't just rename them!!
